fields.name: actor
fields.description: The entity that created the feed item.

fields.name: attachment
fields.description: Information about the attachment. If there is no attachment, returns null.

fields.description: Indicates whether the feed item can be shared.If a feed item has multiple

fields.name: clientInfo
fields.description: Information about the connected app used to

fields.name: comments
fields.description: First page of comments for this feed item.

fields.name: isDelete​Restricted
fields.description: If this property is true the comment

fields.name: isSharable
fields.description: Indicates whether the feed item can be shared.

fields.name: likes
fields.description: First page of likes for this feed item.

fields.name: likesMessage
fields.description: A message body the describes who likes the feed item.

fields.name: moderationFlags
fields.description: Information about the moderation flags on a feed item. If ConnectApi.Features.communityModeration is false, this property is null.

fields.description: If this feed item is a shared feed item, returns information about the original

fields.name: photoUrl
fields.description: URL of the photo associated with the feed item

fields.name: visibility
